page.title: 19Children's Games
page.content: "Tiggy on High" The last one off the ground is "ON" - the others then take a chance to run to another "safe" place,the plerson who is ON then tries to "tig" another child. When they touch someone they say "tug you're on". "Seashells" This game is played with a ball.The person who is on turns away from the others and throws the ball over their shoulder.When someone has the ball all the children put hands behind them and shout "SEASHELLS".The person who is ON turns round and guesses who is hiding the ball.If the guess is right the person with the ball is now ON. "TWO BALL OUT" About six people stand in a circle two balls are passed around.The person who gets stuck with TWO BALLS is OUT.
